text: As I exit the cultish confectionary, I stand stationary atop the quiet city road contemplating the many questions surrounding this case,
the mysteries looming over me like large forest trees to a young child who had just beheld them for the first time.
Speaking of time, that is one thing Iâ€™m quickly running out of.
I feel like I have all of the pieces I need, I just need to string them together.
Our culprit has small feet, has fur, uses some sort of sharp tool or claw and should be in the general direction of the prints.
